Package org.azd.utils

Class BaseClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.azd.utils.BaseClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Client
    public abstract class BaseClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements HttpRequest request methods to send GET, POST, PATCH and DELETE request to Azure DevOps REST API.

      BaseClient()

        requestUrl - pass the request url

      • post

        public static java.lang.String post​(java.lang.String requestUrl,
                                    java.lang.String token,
                                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> body)
                             throws AzDException
        Sends a POST request to REST API with basic authentication and request body
        Parameters:
        requestUrl - pass the request url
        token - pass the personal access token
        body - pass the request body to post the request
        Returns:
        response string from the API if any
        Throws:
        AzDException - throws IO exception

      • post

        public static java.lang.String post​(java.lang.String requestUrl,
                                    java.lang.String token,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.Object> body)
                             throws AzDException
        Sends a POST request to REST API with basic authentication and request body
        Parameters:
        requestUrl - pass the request url
        token - pass the personal access token
        body - pass the request body to post the request (accepts an array of object)
        Returns:
        response string from the API if any
        Throws:
        AzDException - throws IO exception
